Container.Name: TheLogbook
Container.Overview:
The Logbook - An open-source intranet platform designed specifically for volunteer fire departments. Features include personnel management, incident reporting, equipment tracking, training & scheduling, and communications. Built with Django, PostgreSQL, and Docker for easy deployment and scalability.
IMPORTANT: This template sets up the complete stack including PostgreSQL database and Nginx reverse proxy. After first start, access http://[IP]:[PORT:80] to complete the onboarding wizard.
After onboarding, create your first admin user with: docker exec -it TheLogbook python manage.py createsuperuser
Container.Requires: This is a Docker Compose stack. Install using Docker Compose Manager plugin or follow the manual setup instructions in the documentation.
